 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָלַק‎</span> **verb** ==nip, nip off== (head of bird; without ***necessarily*** severing it from body, compare [[Lev.5.8|Lev 5:8]]) (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מְלַק‎</span>,<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּמָלַק אֶתרֿאֹשׁוֺ‎</span> [[Lev.1.15|Lev 1:15]], i.e. head of dove; compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּמָלַק אֶתרֿאֹשׁוֺ מִמּוּל עָרְפּוֺ וְלֹא יַבְדִּיל‎</span> [[Lev.5.8|Lev 5:8]]. compare [[BDB#Di|Di]]-[[BDB#Ry|Ry]]. [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">ἀποκνίζω</span>. 

I, II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלְקוֺחַ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֶלְקָחַ֫יִם‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלְקָחַ֫יִם‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לקח‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלְקוֺשׁ‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לקשׁ‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֶלְתָּחָה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לתח‎</span>. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלְתָּעוֺת‎</span>] see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְתַלְּעוֺת‎</span> below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תלע‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַמְּגֻרוֺת‎</span> see  I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גור‎</span> [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵמַד‎</span>] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מדד‎</span>.
